name: Fungy's Adventure
description:
Fungy's Adventure is a tiny platformer I made for the 48th Ludum Dare game jam. 

Playing as Fungy the Mushroom, you must make your way down a dangerous cavern to meet your earthworm friend. Watch your step, or else you might get yourself killed.

The game currently has very little content, as I was unable to expand the game within the limited time period. Despite the small scope of the game, it was fun to work on this project and I hope you enjoy playing it too.
